item.title: Django (Python Web Framework) Tutorials
item.description:
Django Tutorials

Django is a high-level Python Web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.

  • Official Poll's Tutorial - It is the Official tutorial of django on the django site.
  • Tango with Django - A Good Introduction to the django terminology.
  • Getting Started With Django - A video series to upgrade from beginner to pro.
  • Two Scoops of Django - A book covering the best practices in Django.
item.dc:creator: Parbhat Puri
